section.title: ethtool - Display or change ethernet card settings
section.screen: # ethtool eth0 Settings for eth0: Supported ports: [ TP ] Supported link modes: 10baseT/Half 10baseT/Full 100baseT/Half 100baseT/Full 1000baseT/Full Supports auto-negotiation: Yes Advertised link modes: 10baseT/Half 10baseT/Full 100baseT/Half 100baseT/Full 1000baseT/Full Advertised auto-negotiation: Yes Speed: 1000Mb/s Duplex: Full Port: Twisted Pair PHYAD: 2 Transceiver: internal Auto-negotiation: on Supports Wake-on: pumbg Wake-on: g Current message level: 0x00000001 (1) Link detected: yes

简单的方法： 一个插网线，一个不插，运行 mii-tool 或 ethtool eth0，看状态是否连接
另一种方法是： tail -f /var/log/messages，当你向其中一个网口做插拔网线的动作时，屏幕上会看到提示信息
section.para: 最好的方法是将mac地址写在启动脚本内.
